---
title: "Pingfan's Slides"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tinytable)
library(googlesheets4)

gs4_deauth()
slides_data <- read_sheet("1WISHM4Y0kp12QAsXMRt3KhE9mQ18ofpNSUzz6V82tU8") %>% 
  mutate(
    Slides = '<i class="bi bi-file-earmark-slides"></i>',
    PDF = '<i class="bi bi-file-earmark-pdf"></i>'
  )
slides_table <- tt(slides_data, escape = FALSE)

slides_table %>% 
  format_tt(markdown = TRUE)

```
